name: ReFuel Your Fun Program
description: Discounted propane refills for reusable cylinders as alternative to single-use 1 lb. propane cylinders
fullDescription: San Mateo County's ReFuel Your Fun program offers discounted propane refills for reusable cylinders, providing an eco-friendly and cost-effective alternative to disposable propane.
whatTheyOffer:
- Discounted propane refills
- For reusable cylinders
- Alternative to single-use 1 lb. cylinders
- Reduces waste
- Saves money on propane
- Environmentally friendly option
howToGetIt:
1. Get reusable propane cylinder
2. Find participating refill location
3. Bring empty cylinder
4. Receive discounted refill
5. Reuse cylinder for camping/grilling
6. Return for future refills
keywords: ReFuel Your Fun, reusable, dishware, utensils, events, San Mateo County, zero waste, party supplies
